Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

cxx:veraxx

Full name:

org.codehaus.mojo:cxx-maven-plugin:0.0.5-SNAPSHOT:veraxx

Description:

Goal which vera++ check sources.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: test.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
commandArgs String - Arguments for the vara++ program. Shall be -nodup -showrules
Default value is: -nodup -showrules.
environmentVariables Map 0.0.4 Environment variables to pass to the executed program.
project MavenProject - Projet en cours de deploiement.
reportIdentifier String 0.0.4 The Report OutputFile Location.
reportsfileDir File 0.0.4 The Report OutputFile Location.
Default value is: vera++-reports.
sourceDirs List 0.0.4 directory were vera++ should search for source files
workingDir File 0.0.4 The current working directory. Optional. If not specified, basedir will be used.

Parameter Details

commandArgs:

Arguments for the vara++ program. Shall be -nodup -showrules
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${veraxx.args}
  • Default: -nodup -showrules

environmentVariables:

Environment variables to pass to the executed program.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No

project:

Projet en cours de deploiement.
  • Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project}

reportIdentifier:

The Report OutputFile Location.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${veraxx.reportIdentifier}

reportsfileDir:

The Report OutputFile Location.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${veraxx.reportsfilePath}
  • Default: vera++-reports

sourceDirs:

directory were vera++ should search for source files
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No

workingDir:

The current working directory. Optional. If not specified, basedir will be used.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 0.0.4
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${veraxx.workingdir}
